Package com.deliveryCompany.components

Class StandardTruck

java.lang.Object
com.deliveryCompany.components.Truck
com.deliveryCompany.components.StandardTruck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Node
public class StandardTruck
extends Truck
Vehicle for transporting packages from the sorting center to the branches and back. All vehicles of this type are in the sorting center.
Version:
1.00 7 Apr 2021
Author:
Ofir
See Also:
Truck

    • work

      public void work()
      A vehicle found during a trip reduces the time left to end the trip by 1, if after the reduction the time value is equal to zero, then the trip is over, the vehicle moves all the packages inside to the point it has reached, while updating the status and history of packages. If the trip ended in a sorting center, then the vehicle goes into "free" mode. Otherwise, the trip ended at the local branch - the vehicle loads the packages from this branch and takes them to the sorting center, the status and history of packages is updated. In addition, a new and updated travel time is drawn in the relevant field.
